title: Validation of a focus reduction neutralization test (FRNT) to rapidly titrate human SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibodies by using the CTL Immunospot S6 Universal Analyzer
content:
Publication date: Available online 20 July 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Ilaria Puglia, Marialuigia Caporale, Claudia Casaccia, Fabrizia Valleriani, Romolo Salini, Shadia Berjaoui, Cristina Marfoglia, Lucilla Ricci, Alessio Lorusso
